name: Overwhelming Blink
description: A horrifying dagger forged in the chaos maw and nigh untouchable by mortal hands.

abilities.name: Overwhelming Blink
abilities.description: Instantly teleports the wielder towards the targeted point. After the teleportation, creates a huge shockwave that instantly deals damage to nearby enemies, based on the caster's strength, plus a base amount. Enemies also have their movement and attack speed slowed, and take additional damage over time based on the caster's strength.
notes: When targeting a point within 1200 distance, teleports directly onto the targeted point
When targeting a point beyond 1200 distance, teleports 1200 distance towards the targeted point instead
Incoming projectiles are disjointed upon teleporting
Doubletap targets a point in front of the team's Fountain
The shockwave at the teleport location is instant, despite the visual effect
The shockwave first applies the debuff, then the impact damage
The debuff deals 16.67% of the caster's Strength as damage in 1-second intervals, starting 1 second after the debuff is applied
Taking more than 0 damage from any other player or Roshan puts the item on a fixed cooldown
Cannot be reset with cooldown reset sources
Shares cooldown with Blink Dagger, Swift Blink, and Arcane Blink

additionalInfo: The item's attributes grant the following additional stats:
25 main attack damage to Strength heroes
11.25 main attack damage to Universal heroes
